name: Coach Mantra
description: COACHMANTRATM is one of India’s leading Coaching brands with a stellar team of coaches with qualifications and experiences unmatched in the industry. Our coaches have varied specializations, and educational and work backgrounds, so you will find the one that’s just right for your needs. Each one of them has been instrumental in spurring profound change in individuals and teams. We have a unique approach that builds on global coaching best practices and adds insightful self-analysis and self-mastery to create a lasting impact. Count on us for Executive Coaching of key individuals, or to Create a Culture of Coaching by training senior managers to be coaches and mentors. We offer ‘carbon-neutral’ coaching delivered anywhere in the world. We use skype, zoom, video calls as well as Face to face meetings for coaching.
